snippet: As the hedge fund industry continues to grow and expand, the Man Group, the world's largest publicly traded hedge fund, has suffered a crumbling stock price and poor market performance.
abstract: As the hedge fund industry continues to grow and expand, the Man Group, the world's largest publicly traded hedge fund, has suffered a crumbling stock price and poor market performance.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and MARK SCOTT

headline.main: Struggling Hedge Fund Under a Cloud
